shiver.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to shake slightly because you are cold or frightened
shiver.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Jake stood shivering in the cold air.
She shivered with fear and anger.
shiver.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a slight shaking movement of your body caused by cold or fear
shiver.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: A shiver ran through  (=went through) me.
She felt a shiver of apprehension.
